chapters.title: Chapter 13:  What Must Be Done
chapters.info: Fager Neald, p. 277—Young, foppish Murandian man with curly mustaches that he keeps waxed to points. He is now one of the Asha'man. He accompanies Perrin. He is fond of stroking his curled, pointy mustaches. Both he and Grady almost died of snakebites suffered during a bubble of evil that hit their camp. They have since recovered.
